Desc.eng: I don’t see the point in wandering around aimlessly. Let’s go back to the lair.
Is this the wolf we’ve been looking for?
Only his corpse. I hate being late.
The Professor’s minions didn’t strike me as too bright. They could have missed the secret notes.
I found something! There’s a journal. But some pages are missing.
Ah! They're not complete morons after all. I might even enjoy hunting them down.
So, what we suspected is true. The beast is dead. The rest of the secret notes must be here.
I found something! There’s a journal. Now we can return to the Lair.
The wolf is dead, but now we have something else to hunt. His killers.
